word embeddings.from sentence: We use word embeddings from GloVe (Pennington et al., 2014) to initialize the model.

dimensionality l.from sentence: The dimensionality l of the hidden layers is set to be 150 or 300.

use.from sentence: We use ADAMAX (Kingma & Ba, 2015) with the coefficients beta1 = 0.9 and beta2 = 0.999 to optimize the model.

update.from sentence: Each update is computed through a minibatch of 30 instances.
